docs.name: Foreman
docs.info: Foreman v2 is stable and recommended for use. You may use v2 by either passing ‘version=2’ in the Accept Header or using api/v2/ in the URL.

apis.short_description: List all hosts for a host group

params.name: hostgroup_id
params.description: ID of host group

params.name: location_id
params.description: ID of location

params.name: organization_id
params.description: ID of organization

params.name: environment_id
params.description: ID of environment

params.name: search
params.description: filter results

params.name: order
params.description: sort results

params.name: page
params.description: paginate results

params.name: per_page
params.description: number of entries per request

params.name: id
params.validator: Must be an identifier, string from 1 to 128 characters containing only alphanumeric characters, dot(.), space, underscore(_), hypen(-) with no leading or trailing space.

params.name: location_id
params.description: required if locations are enabled

params.name: organization_id
params.description: required if organizations are enabled

params.name: environment_id
params.description: required if host is managed and value is not inherited from host group

params.name: ip
params.description: not required if using a subnet with DHCP proxy

params.name: mac
params.description: required for managed host that is bare metal, not required if it’s a virtual machine

params.name: architecture_id
params.description: required if host is managed and value is not inherited from host group

params.name: domain_id
params.description: required if host is managed and value is not inherited from host group

params.name: puppet_class_ids
params.validator: Must be an array of any type

params.name: operatingsystem_id
params.description: required if host is managed and value is not inherited from host group

params.name: medium_id
params.description: required if not imaged based provisioning and host is managed and value is not inherited from host group

params.name: ptable_id
params.description: required if host is managed and custom partition has not been defined

params.name: subnet_id
params.description: required if host is managed and value is not inherited from host group

params.name: compute_resource_id
params.description: nil means host is bare metal

params.name: root_pass
params.description: required if host is managed and value is not inherited from host group or default password in settings

params.name: owner_type
params.description: Host’s owner type
params.validator: Must be one of: User, Usergroup.

params.name: host_parameters_attributes
params.validator: Must be an array of any type

params.name: managed
params.description: True/False flag whether a host is managed or unmanaged. Note: this value also determines whether several parameters are required or not

params.name: progress_report_id
params.description: UUID to track orchestration tasks status, GET /api/orchestration/:UUID/tasks

params.name: comment
params.description: 本机附加信息

params.name: interfaces_attributes
params.description: Host’s network interfaces.
params.validator: Must be an Array of nested elements

params.name: mac
params.description: MAC address of interface

params.name: ip
params.description: IP address of interface

params.name: type
params.description: Interface type, e.g: bmc
params.validator: Must be one of: interface, bmc, bond.

params.name: name
params.description: Interface’s DNS name

params.name: subnet_id
params.description: Foreman subnet ID of interface

params.name: domain_id
params.description: Foreman domain ID of interface

params.name: identifier
params.description: Device identifier, e.g. eth0 or eth1.1

params.name: managed
params.description: Should this interface be managed via DHCP and DNS smart proxy and should it be configured during provisioning?

params.name: primary
params.description: Should this interface be used for constructing the FQDN of the host? Each managed hosts needs to have one primary interface.

params.name: provision
params.description: Should this interface be used for TFTP of PXELinux (or SSH for image-based hosts)? Each managed hosts needs to have one provision interface.

params.name: username
params.description: Only for BMC interfaces.

params.name: password
params.description: Only for BMC interfaces.

params.name: provider
params.description: Interface provider, e.g. IPMI. Only for BMC interfaces.

params.name: virtual
params.description: Alias or VLAN device

params.name: tag
params.description: VLAN tag, this attribute has precedence over the subnet VLAN ID. Only for virtual interfaces.

params.name: attached_to
params.description: Identifier of the interface to which this interface belongs, e.g. eth1. Only for virtual interfaces.

params.name: mode
params.description: Bond mode of the interface, e.g. balance-rr. Only for bond interfaces.
params.validator: Must be one of: balance-rr, active-backup, balance-xor, broadcast, 802.3ad, balance-tlb, balance-alb.

params.name: attached_devices
params.description: Identifiers of slave interfaces, e.g. ['eth1', 'eth2']. Only for bond interfaces.
params.validator: Must be an array of any type

params.name: bond_options
params.description: Space separated options, e.g. miimon=100. Only for bond interfaces.

params.name: compute_attributes
params.description: Additional compute resource specific attributes for the interface.

params.name: compute_attributes
params.description: Additional compute resource specific attributes.

params.name: id
params.validator: Must be an identifier, string from 1 to 128 characters containing only alphanumeric characters, space, underscore(_), hypen(-) with no leading or trailing space.

params.name: location_id
params.description: required if locations are enabled

params.name: organization_id
params.description: required if organizations are enabled

params.name: environment_id
params.description: required if host is managed and value is not inherited from host group

params.name: ip
params.description: not required if using a subnet with DHCP proxy

params.name: mac
params.description: required for managed host that is bare metal, not required if it’s a virtual machine

params.name: architecture_id
params.description: required if host is managed and value is not inherited from host group

params.name: domain_id
params.description: required if host is managed and value is not inherited from host group

params.name: puppet_class_ids
params.validator: Must be an array of any type

params.name: operatingsystem_id
params.description: required if host is managed and value is not inherited from host group

params.name: medium_id
params.description: required if not imaged based provisioning and host is managed and value is not inherited from host group

params.name: ptable_id
params.description: required if host is managed and custom partition has not been defined

params.name: subnet_id
params.description: required if host is managed and value is not inherited from host group

params.name: compute_resource_id
params.description: nil means host is bare metal

params.name: root_pass
params.description: required if host is managed and value is not inherited from host group or default password in settings

params.name: owner_type
params.description: Host’s owner type
params.validator: Must be one of: User, Usergroup.

params.name: host_parameters_attributes
params.validator: Must be an array of any type

params.name: managed
params.description: True/False flag whether a host is managed or unmanaged. Note: this value also determines whether several parameters are required or not

params.name: progress_report_id
params.description: UUID to track orchestration tasks status, GET /api/orchestration/:UUID/tasks

params.description: 本机附加信息

params.name: id
params.validator: Must be an identifier, string from 1 to 128 characters containing only alphanumeric characters, space, underscore(_), hypen(-) with no leading or trailing space.

methods.name: status
methods.full_description:
Return value may either be one of the following:

  • missing
  • failed
  • pending
  • changed
  • unchanged
  • unreported

params.name: id
params.validator: Must be an identifier, string from 1 to 128 characters containing only alphanumeric characters, dot(.), space, underscore(_), hypen(-) with no leading or trailing space.

apis.short_description: Force a Puppet agent run on the host

params.name: id
params.validator: Must be an identifier, string from 1 to 128 characters containing only alphanumeric characters, dot(.), space, underscore(_), hypen(-) with no leading or trailing space.

apis.short_description: Disassociate the host from a VM

params.name: id
params.validator: Must be an identifier, string from 1 to 128 characters containing only alphanumeric characters, dot(.), space, underscore(_), hypen(-) with no leading or trailing space.

apis.short_description: Run a power operation on host

params.name: id
params.validator: Must be an identifier, string from 1 to 128 characters containing only alphanumeric characters, dot(.), space, underscore(_), hypen(-) with no leading or trailing space.

params.name: power_action
params.description: power action, valid actions are (on/start), (off/stop), (soft/reboot), (cycle/reset), (state/status)

params.name: id
params.validator: Must be an identifier, string from 1 to 128 characters containing only alphanumeric characters, dot(.), space, underscore(_), hypen(-) with no leading or trailing space.

params.name: device
params.description: boot device, valid devices are disk, cdrom, pxe, bios

apis.short_description: Upload facts for a host, creating the host if required

params.name: name
params.description: hostname of the host

params.name: facts
params.description: hash containing the facts for the host

params.name: certname
params.description: optional: certname of the host

params.name: type
params.description: optional: the STI type of host to create
